color_of_bulb.prompt: What is the color of the bulb placed on top of green box?

json_schema.name: get_bulb_color
json_schema.description: Retrieve the color of the bulb

color_of_car.prompt: What is the single main color of the car?

json_schema.name: get_car_color
json_schema.description: Retrieve the color of the car

search_results.prompt: What does the image present below 'Details' text contain?
What does the image present below 'Details' text contain?

scene_color.prompt: What is the color of the screen?

json_schema.name: get_scene_color
json_schema.description: Retrieve the color of the scene

color_of_hexagon.prompt: Which color is hexagon in the image?

json_schema.name: get_hexagon_color_name
json_schema.description: Retrieve the color name of the hexagon

color_of_hexagon.description: The color name of the hexagon, e.g., gray, blue, red

cube_count.prompt: How many cubes are visible in the image?

json_schema.name: get_cube_count
json_schema.description: Retrieve the count of cubes

cube_count.prompt: what is the number of cubes selected and position?

json_schema.name: get_selected_cube_details
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the selected cubes and their positions

no_of_selected_cube.description: The number of selected cubes,starting from 0

position_of_cube.description: The position of the selected cube, e.g, (row, column) total rows = 4, columns = 8 start values from 1

file_field_text_color.prompt: what is the color of file string field text under input section?

json_schema.name: get_file_field_text_color
json_schema.description: Retrieve the color of the file field text

file_field_text_color.description: The color of the file field text e.g., white, blue, red

no_of_persons.prompt: How many persons are present the image?

json_schema.name: get_no_of_persons
json_schema.description: Retrieve the number of persons

fog_details.prompt: Is Fog present in the scene? What is the color of fog ?

json_schema.name: check_fog_conditions
json_schema.description: Determine if fog is present and its color

sphere_details.prompt: What is the color of sphere? Does sphere surface look glossy?

json_schema.name: get_sphere_properties
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the sphere's color and surface appearance

is_sphere_surface_looking_glossy.description: Indicates whether the sphere's surface appears glossy

asset_validator_analysis_complete.prompt: What is the percentage value of the progress bar?

json_schema.name: get_progress_bar
json_schema.description: Retrieve the current progress bar percentage

progress_bar_percentage.description: The current percentage of the progress bar

tooltip_visible.prompt: Check if there is a tooltip visible in the image showing Python help text for the 'print' function. If visible, what is the exact text shown in the tooltip?

json_schema.name: set_tooltip
json_schema.description: Set the visibility and text content of the tooltip

is_tooltip_visible.description: Indicates whether the tooltip is visible or not

tooltip_text.description: The exact text content shown in the tooltip

number_of_doors_opened.prompt: If the trunk is also considered a door, how many doors are open?

json_schema.name: get_number_of_opened_doors
json_schema.description: Retrieve the number of doors that are opened

number_of_doors_opened.description: The number of doors that are currently opened

json_schema.name: check_rectangular_yellow_frame_visibility
json_schema.description: Check if a rectangular yellow frame is visible

is_rectangular_yellow_frame_visible.description: Visibility status of the rectangular yellow frame

torus_details.prompt: Is red torus visible? Does it have glowing effect?

json_schema.name: get_torus_details
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the torus visibility, color, and glowing effect

torus_visible.description: Indicates whether the torus is visible (e.g., 'yes' or 'no')

is_glowing_effect_visible.description: Indicates whether the glowing effect is visible (e.g., 'yes' or 'no')

lego_details_after_animation.prompt: Provide number of blocks stacked and their colors

json_schema.name: get_lego_stack_details
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the number and color of stacked LEGO blocks

no_of_lego_blocks_stacked.description: The number of LEGO blocks stacked

color_of_lego_blocks_stacked.description: The color of the stacked LEGO blocks

lego_details_before_animation.prompt: How many lego blocks are visible? List all colors

json_schema.name: get_lego_details
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the number and colors of Lego blocks

no_of_all_lego_blocks_present.description: The total number of Lego blocks present

color_of_all_legos.description: The color of all the Lego blocks

l_shaped_object_details.prompt: Check visibility of L-shaped object and its colors

json_schema.name: get_object_attributes
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about object presence and color attributes

is_l-shaped object_present.description: Indicates whether an L-shaped object is present

colors_in_object.description: Describes the colors present in the object

unit_visible.prompt: is there any unit of measurement present below the XYZ axis label in the bottom left of the viewport?

json_schema.name: check_unit_of_measurement_presence
json_schema.description: Check if a unit of measurement is present

unit_of_measurement_presense.description: Indicates whether a unit of measurement is present

mesh_collision_details.prompt: Check if cube and torus is visible. Provide all colors seen

json_schema.name: get_shape_details
json_schema.description: Retrieve details about the presence of shapes and observed colors

is_cube_present.description: Indicates if a cube is present (e.g., 'yes' or 'no')

is_torus_present.description: Indicates if a torus is present (e.g., 'yes' or 'no')

colors_seen.description: List of colors observed in the scene
